high_descs: Turn left and head to the tall white dresser, face the right side of the dresser
Pick up the white coffee mug that is sitting on the right side of the dresser
Turn left and walk to the wall then turn right and face the dresser, the left side of the dresser
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Look at a mug under a lamp

high_descs: Walk to the cabinet in front of the bed.
Grab the coffee mug off the cabinet.
Walk to the lamp on the cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Examine a coffee mug under a lamp.

high_descs: turn left and walk to the dresser
pick up the mug from the dresser
turn left and take a step. turn back towards the dresser.  raise the mug
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp to see the mug
